Title: Tatarak
Writer: Jaroslaw Iwaszkiewicz (short story "Tatarak"), Krystyna Janda (monologue "Zapiski ostatnie"), Sándor Márai (short story "Nagle wezwanie"), Andrzej Wajda (screenplay)
Actors: Krystyna Janda, Pawel Szajda, Jan Englert, Jadwiga Jankowska-Cieslak
Plot: In small-town Poland in the late 1950s, an aging woman married to a workaholic doctor meets a young man who makes her feel young again. Framed around this story, lead actress Krystyna Janda discusses the death of her husband from cancer.
